title: Disaster Data API
description: Real-time system designed to collect, process, and distribute media content related to natural disasters from social media platforms and distribute using HTTP protocol.

title: eWallet
description: Aims to perform operations like a real e-wallet applications like PayTM. Transfer funds from one user to another, deposit and withdraw funds from external banks.

title: Sway
description: Streamline access to educational content from YouTube. Users can search for topics that they want to study, and the app will provide curated subtopics with relevant YouTube videos.
